required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PD-1 Monoclonal Antibody Plus Apatinib Combined With SBRT in HCC With PVTT
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Arm, Observational Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Combination Treatment With PD-1 Monoclonal Antibody Plus Apatinib and SBRT in HCC With PVTT

lead_sponsor.agency: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: It is a trial to assess the efficacy and safety of PD-1 monoclonal antibody plus Apatinib combined with SBRT as first-line treatment in HCC with PVTT.

primary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as time from the start of treatment to progression of disease or death.

secondary_outcome.description: Overall survival is defined as time from the start of treatment until death due to any reason.
The rate of participants that achieve either a complete response (CR) or a partial response (PR).
The percentage of cases with remission (PR + CR) and stable lesions (SD) after treatment was assessable.
The time between the onset of randomized grouping and the onset of symptomatic progression.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety as measured by number and grade of adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Summary adverse events according to NCI-CTCAE 4.03

arm_group.description: PD-1:240mg,ivdrip,Q3W,begin with SBRT Apatinib:250mg,po,QD,begin with SBRT SBRT:6-10Gy/F,5-8F

facility.name: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor, Head of the cancer center
